title: How to Compare Two Excel Files for Differences in Seconds
description: Stop checking rows manually. Compare two Excel files and find differences in seconds. No VLOOKUP needed—just highlight changes instantly and accurately.

title: 如何在几秒钟内比较两个Excel文件的差异
description: 使用 ExcelCompare 快速对比两个 Excel 文件差异，几秒钟内高亮显示修改、新增与删除内容，替代繁琐的手动核对。免费在线工具，立即使用吧。
